page.title: 11CHURCH ATTENDANCE IN HEDON
page.content: The congregations of all the churches in{Hedon}are 500 per week about 100 of them are children.The smallest congregation is for the Methodist church.This is about 35 adults per week.The largest is for the Roman Catholic church but people come from{ {Hedon}and surrounding villages.This is about 200 per week.St Augustines is about 150 per week but this is just from{Hedon.}The sunday school goes on for an hour except for the church of England which goes on for an hour and a half.The ages they start are three years old for the Methodist church three and a half for the Roman Catholic church and four years for the church of England.They do pictures and paintings,read and write but as they get older the work gets harder.The congregations are stable but there is a gap with the 15 to 30 year olds.
